Package com.spring.web.controller

Class ProfileController

java.lang.Object
com.spring.web.controller.ProfileController
@Controller public class ProfileController extends Object
class is used to control the profile page and functions that come with it
Author:
Samantha Jermyn, Stanley Chilton

    • personalProfile

      @GetMapping("/personalProfile") public String personalProfile(org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Goes to the profile screen and creates all the information to store
      Parameters:
      model - - attribute to pass to HTML
      session - - value of current logged in user
      Returns:
      profile - address to detailed profile

    • Profile

      @GetMapping("/Profile") public String Profile(@RequestParam int id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Goes to the profile screen and creates all the information to store
      Parameters:
      id - - the id of the user the trainer or sales manager is trying to view
      model - - attribute to pass to HTML
      session - - value of current logged in user
      Returns:
      profile - address to detailed profile

    • updateUser

      @PostMapping("/updateUser") public String updateUser(@ModelAttribute("user") User user, org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Updates user and returns to index page
      Parameters:
      user - - user to update
      model - - attribute to pass to HTML
      session - - value of current logged in user
      Returns:
      index - address to index/home page

    • updateUserIndex

      @GetMapping("/updateUser") public String updateUserIndex()
      sends the user home if they try access the update user page with a get request rather than displaying an error
      Returns:
      returns the user back to the index page

    • createUser

      @GetMapping("/createUser") public String createUser(org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      used to create a new trainer or sales user
      Parameters:
      model - - stores the values to pass to the html page
      session - - holds the user id that is currently logged in, means that they can be redirected if not logged in
      Returns:
      editProfile - address to editing profile page

    • addTrainerObject

      @PostMapping("/registerTrainerObject") public String addTrainerObject(@ModelAttribute("user") User user, org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      this method is used to store the registering client in the database if the data is correct, or redirect them to the appropriate place the login error for example
      Parameters:
      user - - takes the userr registration details, encrypts the password and then stores it
      model - - used to store the instance variables such as messages to be passed back to the html code
      session - - holds the user id that is currently logged in, means that they can be redirected if not logged in
      Returns:
      - either gives a login error or redirects the user to the logged in index page

    • addTrainerObjectIndex

      @GetMapping("/registerTrainerObject") public String addTrainerObjectIndex()
      takes the user back to the index page as this is a post mapping and will throw an error if the user hasnt submitted a form
      Returns:
      returns the user back to the index page

    • addSalesObject

      @PostMapping("/registerSalesObject") public String addSalesObject(@ModelAttribute User user, org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      this method is used to store the registering client in the database if the data is correct, or redirect them to the appropriate place the login error for example
      Parameters:
      user - - takes the userr registration details, encrypts the password and then stores it
      model - - used to store the instance variables such as messages to be passed back to the html code
      session - - handles the values of the currently logged in user
      Returns:
      - either gives a login error or redirects the user to the logged in index page

    • addSalesObjectindex

      @GetMapping("/registerSalesObject") public String addSalesObjectindex()
      takes the user back to the index page as this is a post mapping and will throw an error if the user hasnt submitted a form
      Returns:
      returns the user back to the index page

    • viewresult

      @GetMapping("/viewresults") public String viewresult(@RequestParam int id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      this method I used to format the data back to the html so we can display the results of the quizzes they have just completed
      Parameters:
      id - - the id of the quiz the historical data is required for
      model - - the model being passed to the frontend
      session - - the session that stores the users data
      Returns:
      - returns a string that is the mapping for another method
